Rulings.Edison:
●Needlebug Nest can't be activated if you have less than 5 cards in your Deck.
●If you activate Needlebug Nest and an effect is chained that reduces the number of cards in your Deck to 4 or less, when Needlebug Nest resolves you will send every card remaining in your Deck to the GY.

Rulings.Base: 1. "Needlebug Nest" cannot be activated if you have less than 5 cards in your Deck.\n2. If you activate "Needlebug Nest" and an effect is chained that reduces the number of cards in your Deck to 4 or less, when "Needlebug Nest" resolves you will send every card remaining in your Deck to the GY.
